entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers near noon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 11. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
